original_text:
“Woe to those who lie on beds of ivory
    and stretch themselves out on their couches,
and eat lambs from the flock
    and calves from the midst of the stall,
korean_text: 상아 상에 누우며 침상에서 기지개 켜며 양 떼에서 어린 양과 우리에서 송아지를 잡아서 먹고

sentences.original_text: Woe to those who lie on beds of ivory
sentences.korean_translation: 상아 침대에 눕는 자들에게 화 있을진저

sentences.original_text: and stretch themselves out on their couches
and eat lambs from the flock
and calves from the midst of the stall
